allow:
Bash(/Users/adamklein/Development/jump/project.yml << 'YAMLEOF'
name: Jump
options:
  bundleIdPrefix: com.jump
  deploymentTarget:
    iOS: "17.0"
  xcodeVersion: "15.0"
  generateEmptyDirectories: false

settings:
  base:
    SWIFT_VERSION: "5"
    TARGETED_DEVICE_FAMILY: "1,2"

targets:
  Jump:
    type: application
    platform: iOS
    sources:
      - path: Jump
        excludes:
          - "**/.DS_Store"
    settings:
      base:
        PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER: com.jump.Jump
        INFOPLIST_GENERATION_MODE: GeneratedFile
        INFOPLIST_KEY_NSCameraUsageDescription: "Jump needs access to your camera to record videos for analysis."
        INFOPLIST_KEY_NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: "Jump needs access to your photo library to import videos for analysis."
        INFOPLIST_KEY_NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: "Jump needs access to your microphone to record audio with video."
        INFOPLIST_KEY_UIApplicationSceneManifest_Generation: true
        INFOPLIST_KEY_UIApplicationSupportsIndirectInputEvents: true
        INFOPLIST_KEY_UILaunchScreen_Generation: true
        INFOPLIST_KEY_UISupportedInterfaceOrientations_iPad: "UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait UIInterfaceOrientationPortraitUpsideDown UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight"
        INFOPLIST_KEY_UISupportedInterfaceOrientations_iPhone: "UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight"
        MARKETING_VERSION: "1.0"
        CURRENT_PROJECT_VERSION: "1"
        GENERATE_INFOPLIST_FILE: true
        ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_APPICON_NAME: AppIcon
        ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_GLOBAL_ACCENT_COLOR_NAME: AccentColor
        SWIFT_EMIT_LOC_STRINGS: true
        CODE_SIGN_STYLE: Automatic
    dependencies:
      - sdk: Vision.framework
      - sdk: AVFoundation.framework
      - sdk: CoreImage.framework
      - sdk: Photos.framework
      - sdk: PhotosUI.framework
YAMLEOF)

Bash(git -C /Users/adamklein/Development/jump commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix ShapeStyle compile error for custom theme colors

Add ShapeStyle extension so custom colors \(.jumpSubtle, .jumpAccent, etc.\)
are discoverable in .foregroundStyle\(\), .fill\(\), and .stroke\(\) contexts.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
